experiences.title: Front-end Developer
experiences.description: As a Tech Lead and Front-end Developer, I lead a team, ensure code quality, and optimize the usability of applications. I use React, TypeScript, JavaScript, and other tools, following agile methodologies and CI/CD practices. My goal is to lead the team, deliver consistent projects, and drive company growth.

experiences.title: Developer
experiences.description: As a Developer, I work in a consolidated company in the market, my goal is to contribute to the company's growth, delivering consistent and quality projects. In addition, I seek to develop professionally, learning from the best and sharing knowledge.
